definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨叶酸对卵巢癌细胞增殖的影响及作用机制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检查在卵泡膜细胞瘤诊断中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To research the LISREL and its application in the biomedical studies.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨线性结构模型理论及其在医学中的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺结核所致肺心病的诊断和治疗特点。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨烧伤科新护士综合护理能力的培养方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨B型超声对妇科急腹症的临床诊断价值。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨右下腹包块的临床诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性脑室出血的临床特点和治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨介入治疗儿童股骨头缺血性坏死的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anatomical structures of the posterior column of the acetabulum and the related clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨髋臼后柱的解剖学结构及其相关临床意义。

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects of Aralia echinocaulis Foot bark.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨刺茎楤木根皮的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the treatment of cooperative care of patients with IVP.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉肾盂造影的护理配合。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of supraglottic horizontal partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨喉声门上水平部分切除术的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高频超声对跟腱损伤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步探讨客观评价大鼠心肌缺血模型的指标。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
